Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Jefferson Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Jefferson Park due to police activity.
